forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 46. West southwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 55, with temperatures falling to around 52 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn unfurls over Downtown San Francisco, a cozy haze drapes the city, inviting a peaceful reflection amid the cloud-blanketed skyline. The mercury hovers like a cautious guest, settling into the lower forties, while a light wind whispers at three miles per hour, barely stirring the air but adding a slight chill to the morning. The promise of the day ahead emerges through the clouds, hinting at brief moments when the sun will peek through, carrying a high of fifty-five with it. Yet, as the afternoon progresses, temperatures are set to drift lower, settling into the low fifties, a reminder of the city’s capricious maritime embrace.

The marine layer, a familiar companion to San Francisco's mornings, mingles with the clouds, softening visibility but fostering a serene ambiance. For those navigating the streets, layers are the sensible choice—perhaps a light sweater or a jacket, complemented by a scarf to ward off the cool draft. Embrace the day by ambling through the gardens of Golden Gate Park or savoring a warm cup of coffee at a local café, where one can watch the world liven with the day’s gradual unveiling. There’s a quiet charm today, an invitation to experience the city’s rhythm at a leisurely pace, sheltered from the fleeting fog and embraced by its enchanting mystery.
